function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of awareness and technical expertise for upper room germicidal uv implementation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of routine use of upper room germicidal uv in buildings where airborne infection is likely","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underestimation of the necessity of air disinfection in a wider variety of public settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of homes as priorities for air disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient mechanical ventilation systems leading to the spread of airborne infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surface disinfection in unoccupied rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited exposure time of microbes to upper room guv","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective air disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air changes per hour ach","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of recapture, drafts, and noise","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low percentage of outside air in hvac system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of high-level air filtration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on low ach in hvac systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacy of hvac systems for infection control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of ventilation efficiency calculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability and maintenance of hvac systems in resource-limited settings, and neglect in resource-rich settings, can lead to ineffective room air disinfection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of natural ventilation due to building design, sub-optimal practice, closed windows, and variable wind direction and speed.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in rebreathed air fraction raf due to closing windows and using ductless air conditioning, leading to increased risk of airborne infection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the built environment due to its stability in air and low infectious dose","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective focus on high-level air filtration in central hvac systems for covid-19 mitigation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Blurred distinction between different pathways of respiratory infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less transmission by large droplets and surfaces, and more by the airborne route","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 and 2 deaths attributed primarily to airborne transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of germicidal ultraviolet guv air disinfection leading to unchecked viral spread in the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in understanding the transmission pathways of covid-19 leading to ineffective control measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential development of drug-resistant pathogens due to inadequate disinfection measures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provocations of right-wing parties calling for a ’return to normality’ and stopping npis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlooking the immediate health and well-being benefits of npis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustained decline in the incidence of respiratory diseases, including influenza and measles, but rebounding of rhinoviruses in children after the reopening of schools","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant reduction in aris and other infectious diseases during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Harmful collateral effects on health from non-pharmaceutical interventions npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interrupted or delayed access to healthcare due to pandemic control measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased hospital admissions for non-covid related diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative psycho-social effects of prolonged npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxation of state restrictions leading to increased covid-19 infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Under-reporting of cases and difficulties in getting tested","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimated infection cases due to sensitivity analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the transmission factor eta beta","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low public compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality of data on covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social identity affecting compliance with public health advice","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or ineffective implementation of mitigation measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public non-compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures across states","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in compliance indicator associated with changes in infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of restrictions leading to increased infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergent trends in infection rates despite similar community mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low compliance with mitigation policies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate testing policy","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent mitigation policies and responses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
